title: Baofeng
author: Baofeng
created_time: April 10, 2023, 10:00:58 AMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 10:59:14 PM by Baofeng
content: Website: Code:https://syscoin.live/[img width=450]https://talkimg.com/images/2023/05/16/blob050428eeadd1b534.png[/img]Archive: https://archive.is/wiUAAIt will ask to connect your wallet, so please don't do it, otherwise if will drain your wallet right away.The original site is: https://syscoin.org/.So just be careful not to fall for this fake website.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Thank you, and it is good that MetaMask has prevented users from accessing this scam domain. As you can see, the difference lies in the domain name and the post-dot for both domains, but few people notice that. Scammers always intend to make the interface of their scam site somewhat similar to the official domain of the project, so if the person is hasty and someone sends him the fake domain for the Syscoin project, then this person will inevitably not notice the difference until it is too late, so be careful in making decisions and not rushing and not connecting the main wallet in something that it deems suspicious and these tips will be most useful.Also, it is good that we report this domain so that it is suspended.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The fake site is not accessible anymore, the domain or the host might have taken it down or the developers have taken it down because they are already reported and exposed, hopefully, they have not scammed people but I doubt it.They will continue to create a platform like this because of people's greediness and lack of knowledge on how these scammers work as long as we have these kinds of people who failed to do research, scammers will create plans and scheme to scam people, scammers thrive on newbies greediness.

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 13, 2023, 07:47:23 AMThe fake site is not accessible anymore, the domain or the host might have taken it down or the developers have taken it down because they are already reported and exposed, Yes i am also trying to open this Phishing website but it's showing above message. i wonder how fast this website domain has been deleted. Thanks OP for sharing with this. i hope no one fall victim because website was new and easily traceable as a scam by Metamask. Quote from: Baofeng on April 10, 2023, 10:00:58 AMWebsite: Code:https://syscoin.live/Archive: https://archive.is/wiUAAIt will ask to connect your wallet, so please don't do it, otherwise if will drain your wallet right away.If you connected your Metamask your entire fund will be taken by the hacker. These scammers are using advance bots for this purpose which automatically make a popup to your Metamask and automatic trace fund in your wallet. The amount of fee will be same to your fund balance and if you approve, Nothing can be done after that. Always be careful and read full especially amount of fee before approving Metamask funds.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: albon on April 11, 2023, 04:11:24 PMAlso, it is good that we report this domain so that it is suspended.Yes, I forgot to informed that I also reported this site once I found out about it. And maybe the community as well because it won't take like 5 minutes to report this phishing site to: https://safebrowsing.google.com/safebrowsing/report_phish/?hl=enQuote from: coin-investor on April 13, 2023, 07:47:23 AMThe fake site is not accessible anymore, the domain or the host might have taken it down or the developers have taken it down because they are already reported and exposed, hopefully, they have not scammed people but I doubt it.They will continue to create a platform like this because of people's greediness and lack of knowledge on how these scammers work as long as we have these kinds of people who failed to do research, scammers will create plans and scheme to scam people, scammers thrive on newbies greediness.True, at least the action was swift and it has been take down already but the registrar or the domain hosting.We know that this kind of pattern from cyber criminals are going to continue because there are still a lot of gullible individuals here, mostly newbies who can fall from this trick and so it will be a very expensive lessons for them. So that best thing to do is to really exposed this in this community and let everyone know about it. Who knows we can save a lot of newbies from losing their hard earn money.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I tried as well but the site has been taken down thanks to OP for exposing them for their nefarious act. Only God knows how many have already fall victim of that fake website phishing and secondly the Swift response to reporting the site from members here was wonderful as it was done with utmost effect to further stall people's wallet from being hacked and funds stolen.@Baofeng you did a good job by making available the report form so members could see it and making report immediately when ever any fake phishing website is spotted. How I wish it is possible to make a pinned post of that Google for to report fake phishing website. That would be nice as members could see and report immediately any of such noticed and verified fake phishing website.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Not going to be the last attempt from this scammers though.We might see another site popping up targeting Syscoin, maybe it was the hype that's why they are also riding on the popularity of this projecdt.Nevertheless its good to see that some of our members here are actively exposing this fake and phishing site and all we can contribute is to report them right away.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on April 14, 2023, 08:59:33 PMWe know that this kind of pattern from cyber criminals are going to continue because there are still a lot of gullible individuals here, mostly newbies who can fall from this trick and so it will be a very expensive lessons for them. So that best thing to do is to really exposed this in this community and let everyone know about it. Who knows we can save a lot of newbies from losing their hard earn money.Good job Thank you for the good effort.Yes, it is necessary to continue reporting these suspicious sites even if they are removed or blocked because it is very easy for them to create a new one with a similar domain.It is noticed that they always use the same method in choosing famous names, which unfortunately causes some hasty people who do not search well to fall victim to these scams.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: It looks like my phantom extension already knows it firsT But Phishing site like this is created everyday by some scammer. My email, telegram, and Discord are full of some phishing sites just be careful guys and always double check. Stay safe

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on April 17, 2023, 01:59:19 PMIt looks like my phantom extension already knows it firsT This Phishing site is banned and detective by many extension very quickly. I don't know it is because of many reports or any other reason but many phishing site is active for many months and not detective by Metamask yet. The most famous are Stargate, arbitrum, Zksync related phising sites. Quote from: dansus021 on April 17, 2023, 01:59:19 PMBut Phishing site like this is created everyday by some scammer. My email, telegram, and Discord are full of some phishing sites just be careful guys and always double check. Stay safeYes creating these sites are quite easy and social Platform is source of advertising. These scammers often use autobot which send Thousand message to Telegram, discord, twitter inbox and email.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: ItsCrafty on April 17, 2023, 06:53:03 PMThis Phishing site is banned and detective by many extension very quickly. I don't know it is because of many reports or any other reason but many phishing site is active for many months and not detective by Metamask yet. The most famous are Stargate, arbitrum, Zksync related phising sites. Yes In this case Phantom has a community database so the community can update it whenever find the phishing or scam sites https://github.com/phantom/blocklist and initiative like this is always helpful
